name: Infinity Racer - Extreme Race
description:
Infinity Racer is designed to be a fast, simple to control and satisfying to flight experience. Enjoy the simple and colorful atmosphere and master your reflexes. In infinity Racer, you can flight through various Worlds with their own unique style and color palette, unlock ships and enjoy the ride to infinity with some chill music.

Features:
+ 5 unique worlds with their own style
+ earn credits and unlock new ships
+ High-Speed action and chill music
+ Beat your own high scores
+ Various obstacles in countless formations to overcome
+ Infinite fun
